SCOND
--standard pressure, standard temperature, gravity
0.1 288 0.0/

-- time step, max time step, total time, increase on success, reduce on fail
0.001 0.5 100 1.2 0.5
/

FRACTURE_MARKER
CellEntityIds 0 1000 1001 1 100 0.01
/

MESH
./output/frac.vtk
/

SCHEME
-- params:
-- scheme name;
-- allow use of harmonic points;
-- allow use of neumann bc;
-- allow interpolation by continuity of flux;
-- allow interpolation by reverse distances
--
-- scheme names:
-- tpfa_old, tpfa,
-- ntpfa_a, nmpfa_a, mpfa_a
-- ntpfa_b, nmpfa_b, mpfa_b
-- ntpfa_c,
-- mpfa_o, mpfa_l, mpfa_g
--
TPFA
/

TENSOR
-- name of tensor on mesh
PERM
/

WELLS
--file for wells
wells_test2_2ph.txt
/

EQUATION_RESCALE
-- rescale volume, transmissibilities, well index
--0.17810760667903525 1.127e-3 1
1 1 1
/

DOMAIN_RESCALE
-- action: x = x*scale_x + shift_x
-- scale_x, scale_y, scale_z, shift_x, shift_y, shift_z
50 50 10 -50 -25 4010
/

PERMEABILITY_MODEL
naive
/

LINEAR_SOLVER
-- method (MLILUC, ILU2, PETSC, IFPACK, AZTEC, BELOS, ML), maximum iterations,
-- relative tolerance, absolute tolerance, divergence tolerance
-- tau in ilu(tau), tau2 in ilu2(tau,tau2), l in bcgs(l),
-- overlap in asm, tau in ddpq reordering, adapt ddpq tau, reorder for sparsisity,
-- estimate inverse norms
--mptiluc 5000 1.0e-14 1.0e-12 1.0e+20 1.0e-1 1.0e-1 1 0 0 0 0 1 
ilu2 5000 1.0e-14 1.0e-8 1.0e+20 1.0e-1 5.0e-2 1 0 0 0 0 1 
/

NONLINEAR_SOLVER
--relative tolerance; 
--absolute tolerance;
--divergence tolerance;
--maximum iterations;
--sofisticated change of gas phase;
--chop step by saturation overshoot;
--maximum repetitions of the same error in same cell;
--switch off gas equations after this number of state changes
--euristics to choose steplength on each newton iteration
--that helps avoid stationary iterations;
--coefficient in smooth upwind for pressure, eps in (x/sqrt(x*x+eps)+1)/2;
--coefficient in smooth upwind for capillary pressure eps in (x/sqrt(x*x+eps)+1)/2.
1.0e-3 1.0e-5 1.0e+20 8 1 1 3 100 1
/
